Customize the preoperative instructions printout

1 Open the following file in Microsoft Word or another text editor:

C:\Picis\eVal\Resources\PREOPINST.htm

2 The document will combine standard text with dynamic data from a patient’s evaluation. Rewrite the standard text as needed. Use the following variables for dynamic data:

#PATIENT-NAME#: First and last name as shown in the header of the preoperative summary.

#PATIENT-ID#: Patient identification number displayed in the header of the preoperative summary.

#PLANNED-PROCEDURES#: Procedures documented in the form for diagnoses and procedures

#DATE-OF-SURGERY#: Surgery date displayed in the demographics form.

#PATIENT-INSTRUCTIONS#: Instructions for the patient selected in the preoperative instructions form.

#PREOP-MEDICATIONS#: Instructions regarding medications selected in the current medications form.

3 Save the file.
